divs: Sighting DetailsI WATCHED THE OBJECT SLOWLY MOVE OVER SALISBURY RESERVATION HEADING TOWARD MY GENERAL DIRECTION. IT WAS VERY BRIGHT AN GLOWED AN ORANGE COLOR. AT FIRST I THOUGHT MAYBE IT WAS A JET AFTERBURNER, THEN I NOTICED IT WAS MOVING TO SLOW FOR A JET IN AFTERBURNER. AS I WATCHED RISE AND MOVE SOUTH ,IT ALL OF A SUDDEN MOVED AWAY AT A VERY HIGH SPEED.FIRST IT WAS HERE THEN IT WAS FAR AWAY THEN GONE.I LIVE AT THE BEACH AND SEE ALL KINDS OF AIRCRAFT, IN FACT THERE IS A SMALL AIRPORT A MILE FROM MY HOUSE,I HAVE NEVER SEEN ANYTHING MOVE LIKE THAT IN MY LIFE.I CAN'T SAY FOR SURE IT WAS A U.F.O. BUT I HAVE NEVER, I REPEAT NEVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE THAT BEFORE.BEFORE GOD ALMIGHTY. I WENT OUT TO SMOKE A CIGARETTE. THATS WHEN I NOTICED THE BRIGTNESS THE ORANGE GLOWING OVAL SHAPE. NO NAV. LIGHTS. NO STROBE LIGHTSHOW I FELT WAS CUROUS THEN ALITTLE STUNNED.I DIDN'T SO MUCH MOVE IT WAS MORE LIKE FLOATING. I LOST SIGHT OF THE OBJECT WHEN IT JUST RAPIDLY FLEW AWAY.
Summary: orange colored, glowing very bright, no sound, moved very slow then moved away very very fast
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lawrence
There were no other sightings in Lawrence on or around October 10th 2009
